short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make bright websites more comfortable in low light environments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nitefilter makes browsing in low light environments more comfortable.

This Chrome extension uses CSS-filter to invert colors, reduce brightness and change the color tones.

Source: https://github.com/arnemahl/nitefilter

----

# Version 1.0.0

Nitefilter now has consistent state across all tabs. That means that when you click the icon, it gets turned on/off in all tabs. However, doing this requires more permissions. If you liked it better before, please leave a review and I'll consider making a lite version that only applies to the current tab.
